str.name: Strength
str.desc: Affects physical damage. Slightly affects Max Health. Affects stun threshold.

dex.name: Dexterity
dex.desc: Affects AP regen. Affects damage with ranged weapons. Affects paralysis threshold.

wis.name: Wisdom
wis.desc: Affects magic damage. Slightly affects Max MP

luk.name: Luck
luk.desc: Affects item find. Slightly affects physical and ranged damage. Affects poison threshold.

armorPenFlat.name: Flat Armor Penetration
armorPenFlat.desc: Ignores a flat amount of the targets armor.

armorPenPercent.name: Percent Armor Penetration
armorPenPercent.desc: Ignores a percent amount of the targets armor.

magicResPenFlat.desc: Ignores a flat amount of the targets Magic Resistance.
